one.id - your personal vault providing unparalleled convenience, security and transparency over password managers.

You Control Your Data
At one.id, we're revolutionizing the way your digital security is handled. Leveraging cutting-edge decentralized technology, we ensure that your data remains exclusively yours â€” no central entity holds your keys. Unlike traditional password managers, our platform guarantees unparalleled privacy and security, by design, eliminating the risk of massive data breaches. Join us on the journey to reclaim your digital autonomy, where your data remains encrypted, secure, and truly yours.

Enhanced Security
At one.id, our commitment to enhanced security is unparalleled. Utilizing cutting-edge, competition-winning encryption algorithms, we ensure that your data is fortified with the most robust security measures available. As a biometric-first company, we offer a level of security far beyond traditional passwords, providing a seamless, secure experience without the hassle of remembering complex passwords. Moreover, we enforce HTTPS across our entire site, guaranteeing that your data is encrypted in transit from the moment you begin to input it. With one.id, your digital security is in the safest hands.

Managed For You
At one.id, our platform seamlessly bridges convenience with security, transforming how businesses interact with user data. With a simple scan of your biometrics, you grant businesses the one time ability to connect to a portion of your vault, allowing them to establish the key that will be used to identify you in the future. But don't worry everything they do is itemized before you put your thumb down! So you don't need to remember a thing, you don't need to create anything and you don't need to renew anything (phew).
